<p>The <code>manimlib/camera/camera_frame.py</code> file defines the <code>CameraFrame</code> class, which encapsulates the camera's frame as a manipulable object within the Manim animation framework. This class allows for positioning, rotating, and updating the camera's viewpoint using various transformations and methods, facilitating dynamic scene rendering and camera movements.</p>
<ul>
  <li><strong>CameraFrame</strong>: The main class in this file, representing the camera's frame as a Mobject. It provides methods to manipulate the camera's position and orientation, such as setting Euler angles, incrementing angles, and resetting to default states. It also supports updating its state over time with updaters.</li>
</ul>
